summary: Adds a follower of version Sinding the Werewolf in Bloated Man's Grotto. Scales to level and has the Lightfoot Perk. v
descriptionHtml:
My first Mod it's not much but I really wanted him as a follower and thus was motivated to make this. since I didn't see a similar mod I decided to upload it. Other than the Vanilla Skyrim it has (to my knowledge) no requirements.

Adds a follower of Sinding the Werewolf in Bloated Man's Grotto. Scales to level and has the Lightfoot Perk.

Should also in theory be available for Marriage but, have not tested this myself.

Note: This is intended for after ill met by moonlight is complete and [u]WILL[/u] break the quest if applied before then.

Changelog: [spoiler]
[i]v1.2 -
Completely remade the mod so it now uses the original Sinding instead as I found that the two versions would attack each-other if they met for some reason. as a result of modifying the voice type of the original Sinding the Ill met by moonlight quest is almost surely broken if you install this before completing it.
(I may test this at a later date but, if anyone else would like to test it I would appreciate hearing the results.)

02/15/2016 - Added an image as requested.

v1.1 -
turns out I had messed up on the scaling, he should now be [b][u]much[/u][/b] more effective.

v1.0 -
EDIT: Will be tweaking to improve his effectiveness in combat as of right now he is pretty useless. [s](likely due to lacking armor)[/s][/i]
[/spoiler]

Credits/Sources: [spoiler]
* [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/General:Bethesda_Softworks]Bethesda Softworks[/url] (of course)

*Image From [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/File:SR-npc-Sinding_02.jpg]uesp.net[/url]

*Follower creation guide on hubpages [url=http://hubpages.com/games-hobbies/Hot-to-Turn-Your-Skyrim-Character-into-a-Follower](Link)[/url]

[/spoiler]
author: Sjaybird
